::Zdorab::

A tall, slim, brown and green bot walks out from behind a pile of crates,
looking over a data pad readout of his inventory when he looks up with a bit
of a start at Dollen�s presence. Then he smiles. �Oh! You must be the
Alliance rep. Hello, hello. Welcome, welcome.� He puts the data pad down on
a small crate and walks over to Dollen with his hand outstretched. �My name
is Zdorab of Pinch Enterprises. And your name again is�?�
